content.raw: at least the minor yes, major is not mandatory in the case of 0.x . We need to update the dependencies in:  release-tools and release repo. If we release more ign-launch stable 0.x versions, it will affect current Acropolis. If we want to keep both Acropolist and Blueprint separated then it could be a good time to bump to 1.x.
